name: Google: The Good Boy
description:
Google is a virtual fish. Google is a good boy.

Made for Ludum Dare #46 for the theme 'Keep it alive', and inspired by my personal good boy. Google is a Paratilapia polleni from Madagascar. He doesn't need any special attention, just feed him every once in a while, keep the glass clean - and he should thrive.

This is a virtual-pet as opposed to a 'game'. 

Care Instructions

- Google will only eat when he is hungry, and sometimes he isn't quick enough to grab his snack before it hits the ground.

- If the tank gets very dirty, Google may refuse to eat.

Resources

- The ambient audio clip came from the user 'hisoul' via Freesound.org.

- The feeding SFX came from the user 'Kayyy' via Freesound.org.

- The cleaning SFX came from the user 'FreqMan' via Freesound.org.

- The font is ZCOOL KuaiLe, found on Google Fonts.

- Follows this tutorial (and used provided .cginc file for shader that was written) for the camera effect.

- Water caustic texture taken from Textures.com and modified.
